intro_only_event_multi_unova_festival/69:
We were just thinking of having a get-together
with all the Trainers from Unova who are here
on Pasio!

You noticed that more Trainers from Unova
have come to Pasio, right?

So, we thought it’d be fun to round everyone up
for a little chatting and battling! What do you
think? Pretty good idea, right?

Ooh! [Name:PlayerNickname ], you should
come, too! I promise it’ll be super fun!

Besides, it’d be great for us to get to know one
another better, too!
intro_only_event_multi_unova_festival/68:
Wow, so all of that happened two years before
I went on my adventures?
There’s so much to learn from your stories!
Well, that’s nice of you to say.

You can ask us about anything! We’re here to
teach you everything we can!
OK!

It’s crazy how different everything was
back then.

Like how Brycen was a Gym Leader or how
different Elesa used to look!

Yeah, I feel the same way about how things are
now! What surprised me the most...

is that Iris is now the Champion! She was still
a Gym Leader when I was on my adventures
around Unova!

I thought she was strong back then, but now
she’s incredible!

Ooh! Talking about Iris makes me want to have a
rematch with her!
Let’s go ask her! I doubt she’ll say no!
All right! Come on, Rosa!
I’ll show you how it’s done!

I guess no matter how much things change,
Trainers will always have that passion for battle!
It’s been so hot lately. I guess summer is coming.

Speaking of summer, remember when we went
to Caitlin’s villa? That was so much fun!

Now that I’m thinking about it, I wonder which one
Cynthia went with...
Hm? What are you talking about?

Remember? That summer, Cynthia was trying to
decide which would look better on her...
The white swimsuit or the black one.

I think the black one would be best. She looks
so great in black, after all!

You think so? Personally, I think the white one
would be better.

White just like Swanna! And it might be a
breath of fresh air to see Cynthia wearing
a different color!
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Black!
See? I thought so!
White!
See? I told you!

It looks like you’re having a heated discussion
about fashion.
Well, let a professional model add her two cents!
Elesa! Great, what do you think?

Yeah, which swimsuit would be best? The white
one or the black one?
The best swimsuit for Cynthia would be...
one with synthetic dyes!
Oof... Elesa...

Get it? Cynthia? Synthetic? Pretty good, if I say
so myself!

If she keeps this up, I’m gonna need a vacation
from this vacation!
C’mon, you two! The ocean’s callin’!

Aw, Marlon, let’s take a break! We just got
done battling!

No way! My Pokémon and I didn’t train this hard
just to take breaks!
Besides, the ocean gets me all pumped up!

Haha, that’s Marlon for you—a professional man
of the sea.

A professional man of the sea? You mean like a
sea captain or a fisher, right?

Naw, dude! A man of the sea is a man of
the sea!

Roxie, your dad’s a captain, isn’t he?
A man after my own heart!
Huh? No, my pop is—
Gaaah, I can’t wait anymore!
I gotta get ready to dive in!

Only someone like Marlon could get worked up
this much about the ocean.

I’ll admit my pops is dorky, but even he’s not
this bad!

I met a girl here on Pasio named Mina. Her
paintings are absolutely exquisite!

Meeting an artist like her gave me just the
inspiration I needed to awaken my muse!
Inspiration from a new encounter, eh?

Perhaps if I meet the great actress Diantha,
I can get some inspiration as well.
Yep, I found me someone like that, too!
Oh, you too, Clay?

Who could inspire a business magnate like you?
Someone wealthy, perhaps? Like the president of
the Devon Corporation?

I like where your head’s at, sonny, but that’s
not right.
The one I’m talkin’ about is Roark.

All that passion he puts into his diggin’.
Why, the boy reminds me of a younger me!
And...it got me thinkin’...
Look at you, Clay...

He reminds you of when you were a bright-eyed
boy, huh?
Roark...

If I could get that boy to work for me, we’d
be unstoppable!

Think of all the treasures we’d be able to dig
up from Twist Mountain!
I should have known...

I guess you never change no matter where you
go, do you, Clay?
“Two men, with their gazes locked...

“in the midst of battle, with their pride on
the line...”
Time’s up.
So what’s it gonna be, Marshal?

We’ve spent a lot of time together in the
Elite Four, Grimsley.

I know all your tricks! I know exactly how you
think! My answer is the same!
Heads!
It’s tails. You lose again, Marshal.

You said you wanted special training to learn how
to read your opponent’s expressions in Pokémon
battles, right?

But I think there are better ways for you to
get stronger.

No! What good is training if not to overcome
your weaknesses!
One more time!
Heh, I like that gusto.

“And so, once again, the two men return to the
torrent of battle...
“with the curious girl quietly watching over them.”
